questions.title: When I click, the thingy won't do the thing.
questions.body: Serioiiously, nothing. And I defiantly clicked it. I asked my friend who knows about clicking things. He came over and he clicked it too, and still NOTHING. He said I should ask here.
questions.author: imsupersmart4reals

questions.title: Where is the cd player on my new macbook?
questions.body: Please, I'm begging you, where is it. I have pushed every single button on this thing. I mean it's so cool, it's pink and has rhinestones and it cost like 2000 dollars (I don't really know because I've never had to pay for anything myself my whole life) but I just can't find the cd player and I have this totally awesome vintage cd that I NEED to play. I'll totally be friends with whoever can find it for me (on fb, not forreals lol).
questions.author: macgrl14
